xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: {{include document="ClinicalInformationCode.PatientSheetUI" /}} {{velocity}} #if ("$!{class}" != '') = $doc.name = (% class="twothird-width clear patient-info chapter" %)((( == Patient Information == (% class="fieldset" %)((( #__label('last_name' 'section clear' 'Patient name:') (% class="half-width mandatory last_name" %)((( #__label('last_name' 'hint') #__display('last_name', $obj) ))) (% class="half-width mandatory first_name" %)((( #__label('first_name' 'hint') #__display('first_name') ))) )))##fieldset #__display2Col('date_of_birth' 'Date of birth (mm/dd/yyyy):' 'mandatory date' '') #__display2Col('gender' '' 'mandatory' 'group-title') #__displayIfNotEmpty2Col('health_card' '' '' '') #if ($context.action == 'edit' || ($doc.display('relative') != '' && $doc.display('relative_of') != '')) (% class="fieldset family_study" %)((( (% class="half-width relative" %)((( #__label('' 'section' 'Family study:') ## $doc.display('relative') ## #__label('relative_of' 'section' 'of')## ))) (% class="half-width relative_of" %)((( #__label('relative_of' 'hint' 'Patient (MRN)') #__display('relative_of') ))) )))##fieldset #end )))##chapter (% class="clear" %)((())) (% class="clear clinical-info phenotype-info chapter mandatory" %)((( #__qsBox("$!{class.name}_$!{obj.number}_phenotype") (% class="twothird-width" %)((( (% class="group-title" %) == $!{class.get('phenotype').prettyName} == $doc.display('phenotype')## ))) (% class="twothird-width" %)((( #__displayIfNotEmpty('comments') ))) )))##chapter (% class="twothird-width clear clinical-info prenatal_phenotype-info chapter" %)((( == $!{class.get('prenatal_phenotype').prettyName} == $doc.display('prenatal_phenotype') )))##chapter (% class="twothird-width clear clinical-info family_history-info chapter" %)((( == $!{class.get('family_history').prettyName} == $doc.display('family_history') #__displayIfNotEmpty('family_comments') )))##chapter #if ($config && "$!{config.getProperty('variants').value}" == '1') (% class="clear variant-info chapter" %)((( == Variants == #__variant_displayVariants() )))##chapter #end #end## class exists {{/velocity}}
